data.text: IPL action was so very good on Sunday night. Staff were excellent and very knowledgable with the sport and the IPL league. Beers were cold and the young lad from Mumbai was an excellent waiter, the very best I have had in my entire stay in Dubai. I'll be back for more IPL action.
data.title: IPL ACTION THE BEST OF THE BEST AT AL MAWAL

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear MickcR8661NL,

Warm Greetings from Vintage Grand Hotel!

I wish to extend my heartfelt appreciation for sparing your valuable time to convey your delightful experience. Your feedback holds immense significance for us, as it reaffirms that you cherished your time spent with us especially your experience at our outdoor lounge Al Mawal during the IPL match.

We are thrilled to learn that you found our service and team commendable. Rest assured, your kind words will be conveyed to Thira, serving as a source of inspiration for them to continuously surpass guest expectations.

Thank you once again, and we eagerly anticipate the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.

Kind regards,

Vintage Grand Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Vintage Grand hotel

data.text: We loved our stay ! Clean and spacious rooms . Delicious breakfast! Comfortable bed and very good service at affordable price ! Shuttle bus to major destinations for free ! Recommended this hotel for family stay ! Pool and jacuzzi and steam room were great
data.title: The best 5 star hotel at affordable price ! We enjoyed our stay ! Good location with free shuttle buses ! Good breakfast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued Guest, 

Thank you for taking the time to fill the feedback about your recent visit at the Vintage  Grand Hotel!

We appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you had a fabulous stay. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in not only meeting but exceeding your expectations. 

Your kind words will be shared with our team members which will continue to inspire and motivate the team to deliver exceptional customer service. 

The team is continuously striving to ensure flawless service and great product experience for all our guests. I am glad that the team made your visit and time with us pleasurable and memorable.

We await another chance to welcome you back to your abode in Dubai!

Kind Regards,
Hotel management
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Vintage Grand hotel

data.text:
We went for a family Iftar meal at the Red Diamond Restaurant. 

It was fabulous. 

Miss Laxmi is a great host. 

She looked after us so well. The service was top notch and the quality of the food was spectacular.

Thank you very much Miss Laxmi for your great hospitality
data.title: Red Diamond Iftar Meal 5*

data.text: We have a group and experienced the lovely hospitality from the 21st of feb until now as longer work trip.We were booked here as our national sports team preferred destination. Breakfast is fabulous yet can improvise on pattern of repitation, good gyming facilities, choicest meeting rooms space just apt for the kind of work we are into, swift and crisp laundry services, great parking facilities for our big busses, great front office team lead by Akanksha and Walaa, Anjali and namrata always made sure to cut us keys whenever required.
data.title: Sport Favourite Hotel!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Getaway21364165228,

Warm Greetings from Vintage Grand Hotel! 

Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and become your sports favorite hotel. 

Our colleagues, particularly Akanksha, Walaa, Anjali, and Namrata, would be thrilled to receive such a wonderful review. This is something our staff deeply values, as it reflects our commitment to excellence. 

Your feedback on our breakfast, gym facilities, meeting rooms, laundry services, and parking facilities is highly appreciated.

We hope you will visit us again.

Best regards,
Vintage Grand Hotel Team
owner_response.author: Guest Relation Vintage Grand hotel

data.text:
I'm here till 10 to 15 march. All staff doing there job very well. Dealing is Soo good but specially Rakesh done excellent job during my stay. His attitude is very nice I'm very happy with him n all other staff also. They looks after very well.
 Thanks n Regards
data.title: Five star experience
